amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that the remote operations center for the proposed mine be located in the local community, that the company actively recruit and hire local employees, that all ore produced from the mine be processed in the United States and that all equipment used at the mine be made in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 112-258 to require that the remote operations center for the proposed mine be located in the local community, that the company actively recruit and hire local employees, that all ore produced from the mine be processed in the United States and that all equipment used at the mine be made in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 240 (Roll no. 807).
